title: ‘Producing More Watts Than Ever Before and Learning How To Fly:’ Ashton Lambie’s Adventure As An America’s Cup Cyclor
content:
In 2023, the track champion traded the velodrome for the open seas, working as a cyclor on the American Magic yacht 'Patriot.'

Read the full article at ‘Producing More Watts Than Ever Before and Learning How To Fly:’ Ashton Lambie’s Adventure As An America’s Cup Cyclor on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
